data.title: Leadership
data.text:
Barrie is one of the founding architects of electronic forms technology as it exists today. He was influential in the development of the foundations of how electronic forms are described, processed, and formatted. Barrie has held executive level positions at organizations like Montera Corporation, Infinity Technology Services and JetForm Corporation (acquired by Adobe), where he was the Director of Technology Strategy. In 2003, Barrie founded 4Point when he recognized a market opportunity for creating and delivering enterprise solutions based on Adobe enterprise technology. Barrie’s leadership and understanding of the essentials of successful solution delivery have led to 4Point’s success as a global leader in documents and forms. In taking the company from start-up to world-class organization, Barrie has made 4Point one of Adobe’s leading solution partners for 20 years.

Edith’s experience as an accountable leader in professional services, customer support, partner programs and sales ensures 4Point’s customers get on time delivery of exceptional solutions. As a former project manager at JetForm, her involvement in the service delivery of forms technology adds to the incomparable breadth of knowledge in the 4Point team. Edith’s history of enabling governments and corporations to successfully transform the way they do business through digital transformation solidifies the work of 4Point as a global leader in documents and forms.

Jeff’s background as a sales leader in managed and professional services has allowed 4Point to exceed their goals and solidify themselves as the global leader in documents and forms. With over 30 years experience in IT and cloud solutions, he is able to leverage this expertise to guide the sales team and lead new initiatives. In 2013, Jeff became the co-founder & President of Vantage IT corporation, a Microsoft Silver Cloud Partner focused on Managed Services, IT Security and Cloud Solutions. His leadership and guidance led to the business becoming a highly skilled and respected Microsoft Cloud partner. Vantage IT was acquired by 4Point in 2018. This combination allows 4Point to provide the highest level of services to our customers.

Eric is one of the founding architects of electronic forms technology as it exists today. His incomparable experience in documents and forms spans over 30 years, with expertise in software development, product management and marketing. His work at Delrina, JetForm and Documentum have solidified his expertise in forms and document management. Recently, Eric helped market and deploy cloud based financial solutions, network management solutions and security products. Eric’s decades of industry knowledge and his understanding of the needs of enterprise organizations help 4Point provide unmatched services to our customers.

Jeff’s experience in the financial management of various forms technology companies spans more than 30 years. This breadth of involvement in multiple organizations and industries brings a level of insight beyond compare to guide 4Point through its growth as a global leader in documents and forms. As the former Chief Financial Officer of JetForm, Jeff deployed financial strategies that empowered the company to grow annual revenues to over $100 million. He has been involved in numerous public and private financings, acquisitions, dispositions and other transactions with a total value of over $1 billion.

Kelly joined 4Point in 2010 and is responsible for Compliance, Sales Operations, Recurring Revenue, Support and IT within 4Point. With over 20 years of excellence in the operations field she leverages her extensive knowledge and industry best practices to ensure that 4Point’s systems and processes are efficient, cost-effective and provide an amazing client experience. Her past experience in the banking industry gives her critical insight into the needs of enterprise level organizations which allows her to deliver unmatched operational effectiveness to meet these needs. Kelly is a key participant in the strong partnership between 4Point and Adobe. She helps to solidify the 4Point team as the global leader in documents and forms.

Angèle joined 4Point in 2015 as a software developer, evolving through roles such as training and enablement, technical sales, and strategic advisor. This evolution has given her a unique perspective on forms, whereby she understands both the technical and business needs, along with how to best handle an organization’s unique forms business process. Holding multiple Adobe certifications, and a current Adobe Experience Manager Champion, she leverages her experience to empower customers with the knowledge needed to become leaders in their industry and showcase the art of the possible.
